title: Context-Based Grammar Instruction Design for Second Language Learners in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second-language grammar and intermediate expertise in science fields
context.additional_context: Training for science practitioners combining simulation/VR with task-based learning in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply second-language grammar in science-related contexts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete communication tasks utilizing grammar in simulated real-world scientific work environments via VR simulations with over 90% success.
Learners can successfully submit grammar improvement projects incorporating peer feedback and evaluations using CAL (Computer-Assisted Learning) tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
